# Silver Surges Over 4% To ₹2.34 Lakh Per Kg, Rebounds After Sharp Retreat

## Silver prices staged a sharp recovery, rising 4.27% to Rs 2,34,019 per kg in MCX futures after steep losses from record highs. The rebound followed position adjustments and profit-booking, with support from industrial demand and structural supply constraints. Gold also gained 0.61% to Rs 1,35,768 per 10 grams. Analysts noted margin hikes by CME moderated near-term gains.
